skills: Marketing Strategy, Project Coordination, Graphic Design, Branding, Event Planning, Print Production, Social Media, Tradeshow Coordination, Marketing Collateral Development, Press Releases, Copy Writing/Editing, Web Content Management, Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, Dreamweaver, Flash, Premier, Freehand Graphics, Logo Design, Editorial Design, Web Design, Illustration
summary: While working as Front Desk Receptionist at Meyer Sound, contributed to Marketing Team by updating and translating marketing materials, updating website, and improving sales collateral. Promoted to Marketing Coordinator for Latin America. Contributed to substantial cost savings for Meyer Sound by creating ads for publication, editing graphics, and translating materials thereby eliminating the need to hire third-party agents to complete this work. Researched vendors and negotiated service agreements to have marketing materials and swag for Meyer Sound produced in Mexico reducing costs associated with importing these materials from the US.
work_experience: Since January 2014, worked as a Graphic Designer for a Restaurant Consulting & Management Company, developing design solutions for branding, POP, websites, social media, product packaging, and corporate communications, as well as preparing production-ready art files and creating templates. Concurrently since January 2013, designed print materials such as logos, stationery, flyers, and postcards for various clients. From January 2008 to January 2013, served as a Marketing Coordinator for a Professional Sound Manufacturer in Latin America, coordinating marketing strategies, translating and updating web content, designing marketing materials, creating ads, writing press releases, managing vendor and customer relationships, and planning corporate events and trade shows. From January 2005 to January 2008, held a Graphic Designer role at a Consumer Goods Advertising Agency, producing design solutions for clients including Rimmel London and Dannon, covering layout, image manipulation, prepress production, graphic art, promotional material, corporate identity, and providing graphical support for digital platforms and presentations.
